Minima needs to run in the background to fully validate and secure your coins.

 You can view this setting later in the app by choosing Battery Optimisation from the Options Menu.

 Please grant this application permission..

You MUST NOT uninstall this application without FIRST making a backup.

 Your coins are secured with private keys that ONLY you have.

 Choose BACKUP from the Options Menu and you can RESTORE there as well.

 It's very easy - don't worry..

Minima is currently in ‘Beta’ test net.

 We are running an Incentive Program so you can earn Minima coins for running a node during test net.

 To start earning, insert your Node ID on the Incentive Cash page.

 Be sure to go to the Options menu to log in and find your unique Node ID.

Congratulations.

 You are now ready to start using Minima.

 A new world of Freedom awaits you.
